kreport.name: gzLoadForGroup

data.thead: 处理组 未签收 总受理量 超时量
data.tbody: ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5}

kreport.ksql: --广州分部组工单处理量 select b.executergroupid 处理组ID, b.executergroupname 处理组, b.dt 未签收, b.total 总受理量, nvl(r.overtime,0) 超时量 from ( select n.executergroupid, n.executergroupname, nvl(sum(decode(n.status,'DT',1,0)),0) dt, count(distinct f.flowlsh) total from rec_flow f,rec_node n where f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.status != 'XJ' and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' and n.executergrouporgid='8a92635521a51e8f0121a5211f3e02c2' --经过广州分部 and n.executergroupid is not null and n.nodecode not in('86c9dd900a11226800316ae4eb406c1e','870bb7f90a11226801f8cfbbeebbcb95') --不是报障 报障人确认环节 #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate< ${endDate}+1] group by n.executergroupid,n.executergroupname ) b, ( select executergroupid,n.executergroupname,count(distinct f.flowlsh) overtime from rec_flow f,rec_node n,chk_assessment_result r,chk_entity e where f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.status != 'XJ' and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' and n.executergrouporgid='8a92635521a51e8f0121a5211f3e02c2' --经过广州分部 and n.executergroupid is not null and n.nodecode not in('86c9dd900a11226800316ae4eb406c1e','870bb7f90a11226801f8cfbbeebbcb95') --不是报障 报障人确认环节 and f.flowlsh=r.rec_flow_id and r.assessment_id=e.assessment_id and r.assessment_type='O' and e.entiy_id='8a92635521a51e8f0121a5211f3e02c2' --经过广州分部 and round(r.used_time/60000)>r.total_time --超时 #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate< ${endDate}+1] group by n.executergroupid,n.executergroupname ) r where b.executergroupid=r.executergroupid(+) order by b.total desc
